price: Abin sani kawai sakamakon* waɗanda suke Yãƙin Allah da Manzonsa, kuma sunã aiki a cikin ƙasa dõmin ɓarna a kashe su ko kuwa a ƙere su, kõ kuwa a kakkãtse hannuwansu da ƙafãfunsu daga sãɓãni, ko kuwa a kõre su daga ƙasa. Sannan gare su wulakanci ne a cikin rãyuwar duniya, kuma a Lãhira sunã da wata azãba mai girma.
arabic: إِنَّمَا جَزَٰٓؤُاْ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحَارِبُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَسۡعَوۡنَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَسَادًا أَن يُقَتَّلُوٓاْ أَوۡ يُصَلَّبُوٓاْ أَوۡ تُقَطَّعَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَأَرۡجُلُهُم مِّنۡ خِلَٰفٍ أَوۡ يُنفَوۡاْ مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ ذَٰلِكَ لَهُمۡ خِزۡيٞ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
footnotes: * Muhãrib shi ne ɗan fashi mai tare hanya da makamai. Ana yi masa ɗayan abin da aka ga yã dãce da shi. Wanda aka yi wa "Salbu" sai kuma a kashe shi. Amfanin Salbu shi ne a gan shi, dõmin hankalin mutãne ya natsu. Korewa yanzu sai ta koma ga ɗauri har ya mutu ko ya tuba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innamā jazāu alladhīna yuḥāribūna al-laha warasūlahu wayasʿawna fī al-arḍi fasādan an yuqattalū aw yuṣallabū aw tuqaṭṭaʿa aydīhim wa-arjuluhum min khilāfin aw yunfaw mina al-arḍi dhālika lahum khiz'yun fī al-dun'yā walahum fī al-ākhirati ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
